Uses of Package
exceptions

  • Packages that use exceptions 
    Package Description
    client  
    network  
    server  
    util  
  • Classes in exceptions used by client 
    Class Description
    EmptyResponseException
    Exception to indicate response from remote was empty/null.
    ExitProgram
    Exception indicating that programs has to be exited.
    NoMatchingFileException
    Exception to indicate no matching file was found on the remote.
    NotEnoughFreeSpaceException
    Exception to indicate there is not enough disk space.
    PacketException
    Exception to indicate a protocol violation.
    ServerFailureException
    Exception to indicate server has failed.
    UtilDatagramException
    Exception to indicate problems using Datagram utilities.
  • Classes in exceptions used by network 
    Class Description
    PacketException
    Exception to indicate a protocol violation.
    UtilByteException
    Exception to indicate problems using Byte utilities.
    UtilDatagramException
    Exception to indicate problems using Datagram utilities.
  • Classes in exceptions used by server 
    Class Description
    ExitProgram
    Exception indicating that programs has to be exited.
    NotEnoughFreeSpaceException
    Exception to indicate there is not enough disk space.
    ServerFailureException
    Exception to indicate server has failed.
  • Classes in exceptions used by util 
    Class Description
    PacketException
    Exception to indicate a protocol violation.
    UtilByteException
    Exception to indicate problems using Byte utilities.
    UtilDatagramException
    Exception to indicate problems using Datagram utilities.
